data.nrql: SELECT count(*) AS 'Event Count' FROM PCFContainerMetric, PCFCounterEvent, PCFHttpStartStop, PCFLogMessage, PCFValueMetric facet pcf.domain
select uniqueCount(app.space.name) as 'Spaces', count(*) as 'Events' from PCFContainerMetric facet app.org.name limit 1000

data.source:
::: beyond
 **VMware Tanzu (ex PCF)** 

This dashboard provides an overview of your VMware Tanzu platform health. Apply filters to focus on a specific application or domain.

___

![](https://integrations.nr-assets.net/icons/docs.png) [Documentation](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/integrations/host-integrations/host-integrations-list/vmware-tanzu-pcf-integration)

![](https://integrations.nr-assets.net/icons/alerts.png) [Create Alert](https://alerts.newrelic.com)
:::

data.nrql: select uniqueCount(app.instance.uid) as 'Instances', count(*) as 'Events' from PCFContainerMetric facet app.name limit 1000
select uniqueCount(app.name) as 'Apps', count(*) as 'Events' from PCFContainerMetric facet app.space.name limit 1000
select average(metric.sum / metric.samples.count) from PCFContainerMetric WHERE metric.name = 'app.cpu' facet app.name timeseries
select average(app.memory.used) from PCFContainerMetric WHERE metric.name = 'app.memory' facet app.instance.uid timeseries
select average(app.disk.used) from PCFContainerMetric WHERE metric.name = 'app.disk' facet app.instance.uid timeseries
SELECT count(*) as Crashes from PCFLogMessage where log.message like '%"CRASHED"%' facet app.name
SELECT count(*) FROM PCFLogMessage facet app.instance.uid WHERE log.message.type = 'ERR'
SELECT count(*) as 'Crashes' from PCFLogMessage where log.message like '%"CRASHED"%' facet app.name timeseries
SELECT sum(metric.sum) as 'Failed Task Placements' FROM PCFCounterEvent WHERE metric.name = 'AuctioneerTaskAuctionsFailed'

presentation.title: Auctioneer Task Placement Failures
presentation.notes: The number of Tasks that the auctioneer failed to place on Diego cells. This metric is cumulative over the lifetime of the auctioneer job.

data.nrql: select count(*) from PCFHttpStartStop FACET http.status
SELECT sum(metric.sum) as 'Started Auctioneer LRPs' FROM PCFCounterEvent WHERE metric.name = 'AuctioneerLRPAuctionsStarted'

presentation.title: Auctioneer App Instance Starts
presentation.notes: The number of LRP instances that the auctioneer successfully placed on Diego cells. This metric is cumulative over the lifetime of the auctioneer job.

data.nrql: SELECT max(metric.max)  FROM PCFValueMetric SINCE 5 minutes ago WHERE metric.name = 'UnhealthyCell'

presentation.title: Diego Cell - Unhealthy Cells
presentation.notes: The Diego cell periodically checks its health against the garden backend. For Diego cells, 0 means healthy, and 1 means unhealthy.

data.nrql: SELECT latest(metric.sample.last.value)/1024 AS 'Remaining Memory GB' FROM PCFValueMetric FACET pcf.IP WHERE metric.name = 'CapacityRemainingMemory' AND pcf.job ='diego_cell'

presentation.title: Diego Cell Remaining Memory in GB

data.nrql: SELECT latest(metric.sample.last.value)/1024 AS 'Remaining Disk GB' FROM PCFValueMetric FACET pcf.IP  WHERE metric.name = 'CapacityRemainingDisk' AND pcf.job ='diego_cell'

presentation.title: Diego Cell Remaining Disk in GB

data.nrql: SELECT sum(metric.sum) as 'Dropped Messages' FROM PCFValueMetric SINCE 5 minutes AGO WHERE metric.name = 'opentsdb.nozzle.DopplerServer.doppler.shedEnvelopes'

presentation.title: Firehose Dropped Messages
presentation.notes: The lifetime total number of messages intentionally dropped by Doppler due to back pressure.

data.nrql: SELECT count(*) as 'All Events' FROM PCFContainerMetric, PCFCounterEvent, PCFHttpStartStop, PCFLogMessage, PCFValueMetric TIMESERIES
